channel.title: metabolomics on CityU-Bioinformatics
channel.description: Recent content in metabolomics on CityU-Bioinformatics

item.title: Drug Discovery
item.description: Table of Contents Drug Discovery Drug-drug interaction prediction DDI-CPI | Drug-Drug Interaction via Chemical-Protein Interactome Hierarchical RNNs model-based DDI extraction Ligand-based Virtual Screening FTrees | Feature Trees Frog | FRee On line druG conformation generation Drug Repositioning DRRS | Drug repositioning recommendation system MANTRA | Mode of Action by NeTwoRk Analysis Chemical Toxicity ChemDes | Chemical toxicity : Drug design Molecular editors Bioclipse | Molecule editors : Drug design MCCE | Multi-Conformation Continuum Electrostatics Find more tools: OMICTOOLS Drug Discovery In the fields of medicine, biotechnology and pharmacology, drug discovery is the process by which new candidate medications are discovered.

item.title: Lipidomics
item.description: Table of Contents Lipidomics Databases LIPID MAPS | LIPID Metabolites And Pathways Strategy LipidBlast | Lipidomic spectral libraries : Lipidomics databases MS-based untargeted lipidomics LipidMatch | Lipid identification : MS-based untargeted lipidomics Quantinetix | Image signal quantification : Mass spectrometry MS-based targeted lipidomics MRMPROBS | Multiple Reaction Monitoring-based PROBabilistic System MRM-DIFF | Multiple Reaction Monitoring-based DIFFerential Find more tools: OMICTOOLS Lipidomics or profiling specific classes of lipids biomarkers also provides a unique opportunity to identify diseases other than cancer.

item.title: Metabolic Engineering
item.description: Table of Contents Biological Steps Constraint based methods fastcore COBRA Toolbox | COnstraints Based Reconstruction and Analysis Metabolic pathway prediction EC-BLAST RetroPath Strain design Biopathway Predictor cRegMCSs | constrained regulatory MCSs Thermodynamics SSTMap | Solvation Structure and Thermodynamic Mapping von Bertalanffy 13C-fluxomics COBRA Toolbox | COnstraints Based Reconstruction and Analysis C13 | 13C-fluxomics : Metabolomics Find more tools: OMICTOOLS Growing concerns over limited fossil resources and associated environmental problems are motivating the development of sustainable processes for the production of chemicals, fuels and materials from renewable resources.

item.title: Metabolic Profiles
item.description: Table of Contents Metabolic profiles analysis Metabolic Network analysis BLASTX PiMP | Polyomics integrated Metabolomics Pipeline Metabolite enrichment analysis MetScape | Data integration : Mass spectrometry analysis FELLA | Metabolite enrichment analysis MS-based untargeted Metabolomics mGWAS MWASTools | mGWAS RegScan NMR-based Metabolomics/MS-based targeted metabolomics Spectral corrections NMRPipe NMRPro Spectral deconvolution NMRPipe BATMAN | Bayesian AuTomated Metabolite Analyser for NMR data Chemometric analysis MetaboAnalyst speaq | spectrum alignment and quantitation Metabolite identification W4M | Workflow4Metabolomics MetaboAnalyst Find more tools: OMICTOOLS Metabolic profiles analysis The further development of spectroscopic and spectrometric tools for high throughput analyses of selected biochemical pathways is crucial to the acquisition of metabolome data sets of sufficient quality for metabonomics and metabolomics.
